ice-shard.name: Ice Shard
ice-shard.description:
The user flash-freezes chunks of ice and hurls them
at the target. This move always goes first.

bubble-beam.name: Bubble Beam
bubble-beam.description:
A spray of bubbles is forcefully ejected at the
target. This may also lower its Speed stat.

octazooka.name: Octazooka
octazooka.description:
The user attacks by spraying ink in the target’s face
or eyes. This may also lower the target’s accuracy.

magnet-bomb.name: Magnet Bomb
magnet-bomb.description:
The user launches steel bombs that stick to the
target. This attack never misses.

dark-pulse.name: Dark Pulse
dark-pulse.description:
The user releases a horrible aura imbued with dark
thoughts. This may also make the target flinch.

foul-play.name: Foul Play
foul-play.description:
The user turns the target’s power against it. The
higher the target’s Attack stat, the greater the
move’s power.

psychic.name: Psychic
psychic.description:
The target is hit by a strong telekinetic force.
This may also lower the target’s Sp. Def stat.

silver-wind.name: Silver Wind
silver-wind.description:
The target is attacked with powdery scales blown
by the wind. This may also raise all the user’s stats.

spike-cannon.name: Spike Cannon
spike-cannon.description:
Sharp spikes are shot at the target in rapid
succession. They hit two to five times in a row.

smart-strike.name: Smart Strike
smart-strike.description:
The user stabs the target with a sharp horn. This
attack never misses.

spark.name: Spark
spark.description:
The user throws an electrically charged tackle at the
target. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

breaking-swipe.name: Breaking Swipe
breaking-swipe.description: Breaking Swipe deals damage to all opponents. It lowers the Attack of all hit targets by one stage.

power-whip.name: Power Whip
power-whip.description:
The user violently whirls its vines, tentacles, or the 
like to harshly lash the target.

dragon-breath.name: Dragon Breath
dragon-breath.description:
The user exhales a mighty gust that inflicts damage.
This may also leave the target with paralysis.

dual-chop.name: Dual Chop
dual-chop.description:
The user attacks its target by hitting it with brutal
strikes. The target is hit twice in a row.

extrasensory.name: Extrasensory
extrasensory.description:
The user attacks with an odd, unseeable power.
This may also make the target flinch.

aura-sphere.name: Aura Sphere
aura-sphere.description:
The user lets loose a blast of aura power from deep
within its body at the target. This attack
never misses.

dragon-pulse.name: Dragon Pulse
dragon-pulse.description:
The target is attacked with a shock wave generated
by the user’s gaping mouth.

earthquake.name: Earthquake
earthquake.description:
The user sets off an earthquake that strikes every
Pokémon around it.

vice-grip.name: Vice Grip
vice-grip.description:
The target is gripped and squeezed from both sides
to inflict damage.

electroweb.name: Electroweb
electroweb.description:
The user attacks and captures opposing Pokémon
using an electric net. This lowers their Speed stat.

thunder-fang.name: Thunder Fang
thunder-fang.description:
The user bites with electrified fangs. This may also
make the target flinch or leave it with paralysis.

twister.name: Twister
twister.description:
The user whips up a vicious tornado to tear at the
opposing Pokémon. This may also make them flinch.

swift.name: Swift
swift.description:
Star-shaped rays are shot at the opposing Pokémon.
This attack never misses.

take-down.name: Take Down
take-down.description:
A reckless, full-body charge attack for slamming into
the target. This also damages the user a little.

teeter-dance.name: Teeter Dance
teeter-dance.description:
The user performs a wobbly dance that confuses
the Pokémon around it.

memento.name: Memento
memento.description:
The user faints when using this move. In return, this
harshly lowers the target’s Attack and Sp. Atk stats.

quick-attack.name: Quick Attack
quick-attack.description:
The user lunges at the target at a speed that makes
it almost invisible. This move always goes first.

crunch.name: Crunch
crunch.description:
The user crunches up the target with sharp fangs.
This may also lower the target’s Defense stat.

brine.name: Brine
brine.description:
If the target’s HP is half or less, this attack will hit
with double the power.

rock-tomb.name: Rock Tomb
rock-tomb.description:
Boulders are hurled at the target. This also lowers
the target’s Speed stat by preventing its movement.

sonic-boom.name: Sonic Boom
sonic-boom.description:
The target is hit with a destructive shock wave that
always inflicts 20 HP damage.

muddy-water.name: Muddy Water
muddy-water.description:
The user attacks by shooting muddy water at the
opposing Pokémon. This may also lower
their accuracy.

sludge-bomb.name: Sludge Bomb
sludge-bomb.description:
Unsanitary sludge is hurled at the target. This may
also poison the target.

stone-edge.name: Stone Edge
stone-edge.description:
The user stabs the target from below with
sharpened stones. Critical hits land more easily.

slash.name: Slash
slash.description:
The target is attacked with a slash of claws or
blades. Critical hits land more easily.

aurora-beam.name: Aurora Beam
aurora-beam.description:
The target is hit with a rainbow-colored beam.
This may also lower the target’s Attack stat.

withdraw.name: Withdraw
withdraw.description:
The user withdraws its body into its hard shell,
raising its Defense stat.

screech.name: Screech
screech.description:
An earsplitting screech harshly lowers the target’s
Defense stat.

air-cutter.name: Air Cutter
air-cutter.description:
The user launches razor-like wind to slash the
opposing Pokémon. Critical hits land more easily.

dazzling-gleam.name: Dazzling Gleam
dazzling-gleam.description:
The user damages opposing Pokémon by emitting a
powerful flash.

gyro-ball.name: Gyro Ball
gyro-ball.description:
The user tackles the target with a high-speed spin.
The slower the user compared to the target, the
greater the move’s power.

energy-ball.name: Energy Ball
energy-ball.description:
The user draws power from nature and fires it at the
target. This may also lower the target’s Sp. Def stat.

shadow-ball.name: Shadow Ball
shadow-ball.description:
The user hurls a shadowy blob at the target.
This may also lower the target’s Sp. Def stat.

rapid-spin.name: Rapid Spin
rapid-spin.description:
A spin attack that can also eliminate such moves as
Bind, Wrap, Leech Seed, and Spikes.

poison-fang.name: Poison Fang
poison-fang.description:
The user bites the target with toxic fangs. This may
also leave the target badly poisoned.

sludge.name: Sludge
sludge.description:
Unsanitary sludge is hurled at the target. This may
also poison the target.

thunder-punch.name: Thunder Punch
thunder-punch.description:
The target is punched with an electrified fist.
This may also leave the target with paralysis.

harden.name: Harden
harden.description:
The user stiffens all the muscles in its body to raise
its Defense stat.

aeroblast.name: Aeroblast
aeroblast.description:
A vortex of air is shot at the target to inflict damage.
Critical hits land more easily.

reversal.name: Reversal
reversal.description:
An all-out attack that becomes more powerful the
less HP the user has.

dragon-rush.name: Dragon Rush
dragon-rush.description:
The user tackles the target while exhibiting
overwhelming menace. This may also make the
target flinch.

dragon-dance.name: Dragon Dance
dragon-dance.description:
The user vigorously performs a mystic, powerful
dance that raises its Attack and Speed stats.

pain-split.name: Pain Split
pain-split.description:
The user adds its HP to the target’s HP, then equally
shares the combined HP with the target.

bone-club.name: Bone Club
bone-club.description:
The user clubs the target with a bone. This may also
make the target flinch.

ice-hammer.name: Ice Hammer
ice-hammer.description:
The user swings and hits with its strong, heavy fist.
It lowers the user’s Speed, however.

baby-doll-eyes.name: Baby-Doll Eyes
baby-doll-eyes.description:
The user stares at the target with its baby-doll
eyes, which lowers its Attack stat. This move always
goes first.

smokescreen.name: Smokescreen
smokescreen.description:
The user releases an obscuring cloud of smoke or
ink. This lowers the target’s accuracy.

venoshock.name: Venoshock
venoshock.description:
The user drenches the target in a special poisonous
liquid. This move’s power is doubled if the target
is poisoned.

needle-arm.name: Needle Arm
needle-arm.description:
The user attacks by wildly swinging its thorny arms.
This may also make the target flinch.

mind-reader.name: Mind Reader
mind-reader.description:
The user senses the target’s movements with its
mind to ensure its next attack does not miss
the target.

hydro-pump.name: Hydro Pump
hydro-pump.description:
The target is blasted by a huge volume of water
launched under great pressure.

scald.name: Scald
scald.description:
The user shoots boiling hot water at its target.
This may also leave the target with a burn.

mirror-shot.name: Mirror Shot
mirror-shot.description:
The user lets loose a flash of energy at the target
from its polished body. This may also lower the
target’s accuracy.

aqua-ring.name: Aqua Ring
aqua-ring.description:
The user envelops itself in a veil made of water.
It regains some HP every turn.

ice-beam.name: Ice Beam
ice-beam.description:
The target is struck with an icy-cold beam of energy.
This may also leave the target frozen.

mirror-coat.name: Mirror Coat
mirror-coat.description:
A retaliation move that counters any special attack,
inflicting double the damage taken.

surf.name: Surf
surf.description:
The user attacks everything around it by swamping
its surroundings with a giant wave.

growth.name: Growth
growth.description:
The user’s body grows all at once, raising the
Attack and Sp. Atk stats.

arm-thrust.name: Arm Thrust
arm-thrust.description:
The user lets loose a flurry of open-palmed arm
thrusts that hit two to five times in a row.

flame-wheel.name: Flame Wheel
flame-wheel.description:
The user cloaks itself in fire and charges at the
target. This may also leave the target with a burn.

disarming-voice.name: Disarming Voice
disarming-voice.description:
Letting out a charming cry, the user does emotional
damage to opposing Pokémon. This attack
never misses.

power-swap.name: Power Swap
power-swap.description:
The user employs its psychic power to switch
changes to its Attack and Sp. Atk stats with
the target.

covet.name: Covet
covet.description:
The user endearingly approaches the target, then
steals the target’s held item.

water-pulse.name: Water Pulse
water-pulse.description:
The user attacks the target with a pulsing blast of
water. This may also confuse the target.

rock-slide.name: Rock Slide
rock-slide.description:
Large boulders are hurled at the opposing Pokémon
to inflict damage. This may also make the opposing
Pokémon flinch.

incinerate.name: Incinerate
incinerate.description:
The user attacks opposing Pokémon with fire.
If a Pokémon is holding a certain item, such as a
Berry, the item becomes burned up and unusable.

brick-break.name: Brick Break
brick-break.description:
The user attacks with a swift chop. It can also break
barriers, such as Light Screen and Reflect.

seismic-toss.name: Seismic Toss
seismic-toss.description:
The target is thrown using the power of gravity.
It inflicts damage equal to the user’s level.

glaciate.name: Glaciate
glaciate.description:
The user attacks by blowing freezing cold air at
opposing Pokémon. This lowers their Speed stat.

mega-kick.name: Mega Kick
mega-kick.description:
The target is attacked by a kick launched with
muscle-packed power.

pluck.name: Pluck
pluck.description:
The user pecks the target. If the target is holding a
Berry, the user eats it and gains its effect.

fury-swipes.name: Fury Swipes
fury-swipes.description:
The target is raked with sharp claws or scythes
quickly two to five times in a row.

sweet-scent.name: Sweet Scent
sweet-scent.description:
A sweet scent that harshly lowers opposing
Pokémon’s evasiveness.

drill-run.name: Drill Run
drill-run.description:
The user crashes into its target while rotating its
body like a drill. Critical hits land more easily.

accelerock.name: Accelerock
accelerock.description:
The user smashes into the target at high speed.
This move always goes first.

night-slash.name: Night Slash
night-slash.description:
The user slashes the target the instant an
opportunity arises. Critical hits land more easily.

hyper-fang.name: Hyper Fang
hyper-fang.description:
The user bites hard on the target with its sharp
front fangs. This may also make the target flinch.

bite.name: Bite
bite.description:
The target is bitten with viciously sharp fangs.
This may also make the target flinch.

metronome.name: Metronome
metronome.description:
The user waggles a finger and stimulates its brain
into randomly using nearly any move.

magical-leaf.name: Magical Leaf
magical-leaf.description:
The user scatters curious leaves that chase the
target. This attack never misses.

grass-knot.name: Grass Knot
grass-knot.description:
The user snares the target with grass and trips it.
The heavier the target, the greater the
move’s power.

psych-up.name: Psych Up
psych-up.description:
The user hypnotizes itself into copying any stat
change made by the target.

poison-tail.name: Poison Tail
poison-tail.description:
The user hits the target with its tail. This may also
poison the target. Critical hits land more easily.

iron-defense.name: Iron Defense
iron-defense.description:
The user hardens its body’s surface like iron,
sharply raising its Defense stat.

life-dew.name: Life Dew
life-dew.description: The user scatters mysterious water around and restores the HP of itself and its ally Pokémon in the battle.

heart-stamp.name: Heart Stamp
heart-stamp.description:
The user unleashes a vicious blow after its cute act
makes the target less wary. This may also make the
target flinch.

swagger.name: Swagger
swagger.description:
The user enrages and confuses the target. However,
this also sharply raises the target’s Attack stat.

hex.name: Hex
hex.description:
This relentless attack does massive damage to a
target affected by status conditions.

toxic.name: Toxic
toxic.description:
A move that leaves the target badly poisoned.
Its poison damage worsens every turn.

submission.name: Submission
submission.description:
The user grabs the target and recklessly dives for
the ground. This also damages the user a little.

tail-slap.name: Tail Slap
tail-slap.description:
The user attacks by striking the target with its hard
tail. It hits the target two to five times in a row.

psybeam.name: Psybeam
psybeam.description:
The target is attacked with a peculiar ray. This may
also leave the target confused.

fury-attack.name: Fury Attack
fury-attack.description:
The target is jabbed repeatedly with a horn or beak
two to five times in a row.

fire-punch.name: Fire Punch
fire-punch.description:
The target is punched with a fiery fist. This may also
leave the target with a burn.

flame-burst.name: Flame Burst
flame-burst.description:
The user attacks the target with a bursting flame.
The bursting flame damages Pokémon next to the
target as well.

rock-climb.name: Rock Climb
rock-climb.description:
The user attacks the target by smashing into it with
incredible force. This may also confuse the target.

wake-up-slap.name: Wake-Up Slap
wake-up-slap.description:
This attack inflicts big damage on a sleeping target.
This also wakes the target up, however.

leer.name: Leer
leer.description:
The user gives opposing Pokémon an intimidating
leer that lowers the Defense stat.

bug-bite.name: Bug Bite
bug-bite.description:
The user bites the target. If the target is holding a
Berry, the user eats it and gains its effect.

mud-slap.name: Mud-Slap
mud-slap.description:
The user hurls mud in the target’s face to inflict
damage and lower its accuracy.

barrier.name: Barrier
barrier.description:
The user throws up a sturdy wall that sharply raises
its Defense stat.

bullet-punch.name: Bullet Punch
bullet-punch.description:
The user strikes the target with tough punches as
fast as bullets. This move always goes first.

synthesis.name: Synthesis
synthesis.description:
The user restores its own HP. The amount of HP
regained varies with the weather.

earth-power.name: Earth Power
earth-power.description:
The user makes the ground under the target erupt
with power. This may also lower the target’s 
Sp. Def stat.

signal-beam.name: Signal Beam
signal-beam.description:
The user attacks with a sinister beam of light.
This may also confuse the target.

clear-smog.name: Clear Smog
clear-smog.description:
The user attacks by throwing a clump of special
mud. All stat changes are returned to normal.

payback.name: Payback
payback.description:
The user stores power, then attacks. If the user
moves after the target, this attack’s power will
be doubled.

mud-bomb.name: Mud Bomb
mud-bomb.description:
The user launches a hard-packed mud ball to attack.
This may also lower the target’s accuracy.

noble-roar.name: Noble Roar
noble-roar.description:
Letting out a noble roar, the user intimidates the
target and lowers its Attack and Sp. Atk stats.

rain-dance.name: Rain Dance
rain-dance.description:
The user summons a heavy rain that falls for five
turns, powering up Water-type moves. It lowers
the power of Fire-type moves.

growl.name: Growl
growl.description:
The user growls in an endearing way, making
opposing Pokémon less wary. This lowers their
Attack stat.

refresh.name: Refresh
refresh.description:
The user rests to cure itself of poisoning, a burn,
or paralysis.

ancient-power.name: Ancient Power
ancient-power.description:
The user attacks with a prehistoric power.
This may also raise all the user’s stats at once.

snipe-shot.name: Snipe Shot
snipe-shot.description: Snipe Shot deals damage and has an increased critical hit ratio.

morning-sun.name: Morning Sun
morning-sun.description:
The user restores its own HP. The amount of HP
regained varies with the weather.

draining-kiss.name: Draining Kiss
draining-kiss.description:
The user steals the target’s HP with a kiss. The
user’s HP is restored by over half of the damage
taken by the target.

water-pledge.name: Water Pledge
water-pledge.description:
A column of water strikes the target. When combined
with its fire equivalent, its power increases and a
rainbow appears.

psywave.name: Psywave
psywave.description:
The target is attacked with an odd psychic wave.
The attack varies in intensity.

work-up.name: Work Up
work-up.description:
The user is roused, and its Attack and Sp. Atk
stats increase.

cross-chop.name: Cross Chop
cross-chop.description:
The user delivers a double chop with its forearms
crossed. Critical hits land more easily.

double-kick.name: Double Kick
double-kick.description:
The target is quickly kicked twice in succession
using both feet.

rock-throw.name: Rock Throw
rock-throw.description:
The user picks up and throws a small rock at the
target to attack.

aqua-jet.name: Aqua Jet
aqua-jet.description:
The user lunges at the target at a speed that makes
it almost invisible. This move always goes first.

steel-wing.name: Steel Wing
steel-wing.description:
The target is hit with wings of steel. This may also
raise the user’s Defense stat.

dragon-rage.name: Dragon Rage
dragon-rage.description:
This attack hits the target with a shock wave of
pure rage. This attack always inflicts 40 HP damage.

pin-missile.name: Pin Missile
pin-missile.description:
Sharp spikes are shot at the target in rapid
succession. They hit two to five times in a row.

lands-wrath.name: Land’s Wrath
lands-wrath.description:
The user gathers the energy of the land and focuses
that power on opposing Pokémon to damage them.

smelling-salts.name: Smelling Salts
smelling-salts.description:
This attack’s power is doubled when used on a
target with paralysis. This also cures the target’s
paralysis, however.

bulldoze.name: Bulldoze
bulldoze.description:
The user strikes everything around it by stomping
down on the ground. This lowers the Speed stat of
those hit.

mud-shot.name: Mud Shot
mud-shot.description:
The user attacks by hurling a blob of mud at the
target. This also lowers the target’s Speed stat.

rest.name: Rest
rest.description:
The user goes to sleep for two turns. This fully
restores the user’s HP and heals any
status conditions.

tail-whip.name: Tail Whip
tail-whip.description:
The user wags its tail cutely, making opposing
Pokémon less wary and lowering their Defense stat.

flash.name: Flash
flash.description:
The user flashes a bright light that cuts the
target’s accuracy.

synchronoise.name: Synchronoise
synchronoise.description:
Using an odd shock wave, the user inflicts damage
on any Pokémon of the same type in the area
around it.

sing.name: Sing
sing.description:
A soothing lullaby is sung in a calming voice that
puts the target into a deep slumber.

tickle.name: Tickle
tickle.description:
The user tickles the target into laughing, reducing its
Attack and Defense stats.

petal-blizzard.name: Petal Blizzard
petal-blizzard.description:
The user stirs up a violent petal blizzard and attacks
everything around it.

power-gem.name: Power Gem
power-gem.description:
The user attacks with a ray of light that sparkles as
if it were made of gemstones.

flame-charge.name: Flame Charge
flame-charge.description:
Cloaking itself in flame, the user attacks. Then,
building up more power, the user raises its
Speed stat.

hyper-voice.name: Hyper Voice
hyper-voice.description:
The user lets loose a horribly echoing shout with
the power to inflict damage.

water-shuriken.name: Water Shuriken
water-shuriken.description:
The user hits the target with throwing stars two to
five times in a row. This move always goes first.

wring-out.name: Wring Out
wring-out.description:
The user powerfully wrings the target. The more HP
the target has, the greater the move’s power.

vine-whip.name: Vine Whip
vine-whip.description:
The target is struck with slender, whiplike vines to
inflict damage.

wing-attack.name: Wing Attack
wing-attack.description:
The target is struck with large, imposing wings
spread wide to inflict damage.

double-hit.name: Double Hit
double-hit.description:
The user slams the target with a long tail, vines, or a
tentacle. The target is hit twice in a row.

vital-throw.name: Vital Throw
vital-throw.description:
The user attacks last. In return, this throw move
never misses.

stored-power.name: Stored Power
stored-power.description:
The user attacks the target with stored power. The
more the user’s stats are raised, the greater the
move’s power.

night-daze.name: Night Daze
night-daze.description:
The user lets loose a pitch-black shock wave at its
target. This may also lower the target’s accuracy.

crush-claw.name: Crush Claw
crush-claw.description:
The user slashes the target with hard and sharp
claws. This may also lower the target’s Defense stat.

agility.name: Agility
agility.description:
The user relaxes and lightens its body to move
faster. This sharply raises the Speed stat.

slam.name: Slam
slam.description:
The target is slammed with a long tail, vines, or the
like to inflict damage.

scary-face.name: Scary Face
scary-face.description:
The user frightens the target with a scary face to
harshly lower its Speed stat.

mega-drain.name: Mega Drain
mega-drain.description:
A nutrient-draining attack. The user’s HP is restored
by half the damage taken by the target.

shore-up.name: Shore Up
shore-up.description:
The user regains up to half of its max HP. It restores
more HP in a sandstorm.

giga-drain.name: Giga Drain
giga-drain.description:
A nutrient-draining attack. The user’s HP is restored
by half the damage taken by the target.

razor-leaf.name: Razor Leaf
razor-leaf.description:
Sharp-edged leaves are launched to slash at the
opposing Pokémon. Critical hits land more easily.

coil.name: Coil
coil.description:
The user coils up and concentrates. This raises its
Attack and Defense stats as well as its accuracy.

confide.name: Confide
confide.description:
The user tells the target a secret, and the target
loses its ability to concentrate. This lowers
the target’s Sp. Atk stat.

quiver-dance.name: Quiver Dance
quiver-dance.description:
The user lightly performs a beautiful, mystic dance.
This boosts the user’s Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, and
Speed stats.

feint-attack.name: Feint Attack
feint-attack.description:
The user approaches the target disarmingly, then
throws a sucker punch. This attack never misses.

steamroller.name: Steamroller
steamroller.description:
The user crushes its target by rolling over the target
with its rolled-up body. This may also make the
target flinch.

flail.name: Flail
flail.description:
The user flails about aimlessly to attack. The less HP
the user has, the greater the move’s power.

acid-armor.name: Acid Armor
acid-armor.description:
The user alters its cellular structure to liquefy itself,
sharply raising its Defense stat.

bubble.name: Bubble
bubble.description:
A spray of countless bubbles is jetted at the
opposing Pokémon. This may also lower their
Speed stat.

metal-claw.name: Metal Claw
metal-claw.description:
The target is raked with steel claws. This may also
raise the user’s Attack stat.

drill-peck.name: Drill Peck
drill-peck.description:
A corkscrewing attack with a sharp beak acting as
a drill.

horn-leech.name: Horn Leech
horn-leech.description:
The user drains the target’s energy with its horns.
The user’s HP is restored by half the damage taken
by the target.

magnitude.name: Magnitude
magnitude.description:
The user attacks everything around it with a
ground-shaking quake. Its power varies.

play-nice.name: Play Nice
play-nice.description:
The user and the target become friends, and the
target loses its will to fight. This lowers the target’s
Attack stat.

shadow-bone.name: Shadow Bone
shadow-bone.description:
The user attacks by beating the target with a
bone that contains a spirit. This may also lower
the target’s Defense stat.

ominous-wind.name: Ominous Wind
ominous-wind.description:
The user blasts the target with a gust of repulsive
wind. This may also raise all the user’s stats at once.

mirror-move.name: Mirror Move
mirror-move.description:
The user counters the target by mimicking the
target’s last move.

eerie-impulse.name: Eerie Impulse
eerie-impulse.description:
The user’s body generates an eerie impulse.
Exposing the target to it harshly lowers the target’s
Sp. Atk stat.

body-press.name: Body Press
body-press.description: Body Press inflicts damage, but it uses the user's Defense stat instead of its Attack stat to calculate damage.

mach-punch.name: Mach Punch
mach-punch.description:
The user throws a punch at blinding speed. This
move always goes first.

tearful-look.name: Tearful Look
tearful-look.description:
The user gets teary eyed to make the target lose
its combative spirit. This lowers the target’s
Attack and Sp. Atk stats.

acid-spray.name: Acid Spray
acid-spray.description:
The user spits fluid that works to melt the target.
This harshly lowers the target’s Sp. Def stat.

leaf-tornado.name: Leaf Tornado
leaf-tornado.description:
The user attacks its target by encircling it in sharp
leaves. This attack may also lower the
target’s accuracy.

icy-wind.name: Icy Wind
icy-wind.description:
The user attacks with a gust of chilled air. This also
lowers the opposing Pokémon’s Speed stats.

triple-axel.name: Triple Axel
triple-axel.description: A consecutive three-kick attack that becomes more powerful with each successful hit.

knock-off.name: Knock Off
knock-off.description:
The user slaps down the target’s held item, and that
item can’t be used in that battle. The move does
more damage if the target has a held item.

endeavor.name: Endeavor
endeavor.description:
This attack move cuts down the target’s HP to equal
the user’s HP.

scorching-sands.name: Scorching Sands
scorching-sands.description: Scorching Sands inflicts damage and has a 30% chance of burning the target.

lick.name: Lick
lick.description:
The target is licked with a long tongue, causing
damage. This may also leave the target
with paralysis.

megahorn.name: Megahorn
megahorn.description:
Using its tough and impressive horn, the user rams
into the target with no letup.

attack-order.name: Attack Order
attack-order.description:
The user calls out its underlings to pummel the
target. Critical hits land more easily.

light-screen.name: Light Screen
light-screen.description:
A wondrous wall of light is put up to reduce damage
from special attacks for five turns.

psycho-cut.name: Psycho Cut
psycho-cut.description:
The user tears at the target with blades formed by
psychic power. Critical hits land more easily.

protect.name: Protect
protect.description:
Enables the user to evade all attacks. Its chance of
failing rises if it is used in succession.

vacuum-wave.name: Vacuum Wave
vacuum-wave.description:
The user whirls its fists to send a wave of pure
vacuum at the target. This move always goes first.

dizzy-punch.name: Dizzy Punch
dizzy-punch.description:
The target is hit with rhythmically launched
punches. This may also leave the target confused.

shadow-punch.name: Shadow Punch
shadow-punch.description:
The user throws a punch from the shadows. This
attack never misses.

taunt.name: Taunt
taunt.description:
The target is taunted into a rage that allows it to use
only attack moves for three turns.

poison-sting.name: Poison Sting
poison-sting.description:
The user stabs the target with a poisonous stinger.
This may also poison the target.

poison-powder.name: Poison Powder
poison-powder.description:
The user scatters a cloud of poisonous dust that
poisons the target.

fell-stinger.name: Fell Stinger
fell-stinger.description:
When the user knocks out a target with this move,
the user’s Attack stat rises drastically.

super-fang.name: Super Fang
super-fang.description:
The user chomps hard on the target with its sharp
front fangs. This cuts the target’s HP in half.

shadow-claw.name: Shadow Claw
shadow-claw.description:
The user slashes with a sharp claw made from
shadows. Critical hits land more easily.

gust.name: Gust
gust.description:
A gust of wind is whipped up by wings and launched
at the target to inflict damage.

sharpen.name: Sharpen
sharpen.description:
The user makes its edges more jagged, 
which raises its Attack stat.

trick-room.name: Trick Room
trick-room.description:
The user creates a bizarre area in which slower
Pokémon get to move first for five turns.

weather-ball.name: Weather Ball
weather-ball.description:
This attack move varies in power and type
depending on the weather.

counter.name: Counter
counter.description:
A retaliation move that counters any physical attack,
inflicting double the damage taken.

sacred-sword.name: Sacred Sword
sacred-sword.description:
The user attacks by slicing with a long horn. The
target’s stat changes don’t affect this
attack’s damage.

shock-wave.name: Shock Wave
shock-wave.description:
The user strikes the target with a quick jolt of
electricity. This attack never misses.

toxic-thread.name: Toxic Thread
toxic-thread.description:
The user shoots poisonous threads to poison the
target and lower the target’s Speed stat.

hail.name: Hail
hail.description:
The user summons a hailstorm lasting five turns.
It damages all Pokémon except the Ice type.

howl.name: Howl
howl.description:
The user howls loudly to raise its spirit, which raises
its Attack stat.

ice-fang.name: Ice Fang
ice-fang.description:
The user bites with cold-infused fangs. This may
also make the target flinch or leave it frozen.

egg-bomb.name: Egg Bomb
egg-bomb.description:
A large egg is hurled at the target with maximum
force to inflict damage.

sweet-kiss.name: Sweet Kiss
sweet-kiss.description:
The user kisses the target with a sweet, angelic
cuteness that causes confusion.

bug-buzz.name: Bug Buzz
bug-buzz.description:
The user generates a damaging sound wave by
vibration. This may also lower the target’s
Sp. Def stat.

punishment.name: Punishment
punishment.description:
The more the target has powered up with stat
changes, the greater the move’s power.

low-sweep.name: Low Sweep
low-sweep.description:
The user makes a swift attack on the target’s legs,
which lowers the target’s Speed stat.

natures-madness.name: Nature’s Madness
natures-madness.description:
The user hits the target with the force of nature.
It halves the target’s HP.

comet-punch.name: Comet Punch
comet-punch.description:
The target is hit with a flurry of punches that strike
two to five times in a row.

snarl.name: Snarl
snarl.description:
The user yells as if it’s ranting about something,
which lowers the Sp. Atk stat of opposing Pokémon.

iron-tail.name: Iron Tail
iron-tail.description:
The target is slammed with a steel-hard tail.
This may also lower the target’s Defense stat.

headbutt.name: Headbutt
headbutt.description:
The user sticks out its head and attacks by charging
straight into the target. This may also make the
target flinch.

poison-jab.name: Poison Jab
poison-jab.description:
The target is stabbed with a tentacle or arm steeped
in poison. This may also poison the target.

spirit-break.name: Spirit Break
spirit-break.description: Spirit Break inflicts damage and lowers the target's Special Attack stat by one stage.

psychic-fangs.name: Psychic Fangs
psychic-fangs.description:
The user bites the target with its psychic
capabilities. This can also destroy Light Screen
and Reflect.

facade.name: Facade
facade.description:
This attack move doubles its power if the user is
poisoned, burned, or paralyzed.

sandstorm.name: Sandstorm
sandstorm.description:
A five-turn sandstorm is summoned to hurt all
combatants except the Rock, Ground, and
Steel types. It raises the Sp. Def stat of Rock types.

cut.name: Cut
cut.description: The target is cut with a scythe or claw.

tailwind.name: Tailwind
tailwind.description:
The user whips up a turbulent whirlwind that ups
the Speed stat of the user and its allies for
four turns.

grass-whistle.name: Grass Whistle
grass-whistle.description:
The user plays a pleasant melody that lulls the
target into a deep sleep.

crush-grip.name: Crush Grip
crush-grip.description:
The target is crushed with great force. The more HP
the target has left, the greater this move’s power.

skitter-smack.name: Skitter Smack
skitter-smack.description: Skitter Smack inflicts damage and lowers the target's Special Attack stat by one stage.

stomp.name: Stomp
stomp.description:
The target is stomped with a big foot. This may also
make the target flinch.

cross-poison.name: Cross Poison
cross-poison.description:
A slashing attack with a poisonous blade that may
also poison the target. Critical hits land more easily.

thunder-wave.name: Thunder Wave
thunder-wave.description:
The user launches a weak jolt of electricity that
paralyzes the target.

gunk-shot.name: Gunk Shot
gunk-shot.description:
The user shoots filthy garbage at the target to
attack. This may also poison the target.

darkest-lariat.name: Darkest Lariat
darkest-lariat.description:
The user swings both arms and hits the target.
The target’s stat changes don’t affect this
attack’s damage.

confusion.name: Confusion
confusion.description:
The target is hit by a weak telekinetic force.
This may also confuse the target.

heavy-slam.name: Heavy Slam
heavy-slam.description:
The user slams into the target with its heavy body.
The more the user outweighs the target, the greater
the move’s power.

hypnosis.name: Hypnosis
hypnosis.description:
The user employs hypnotic suggestion to make the
target fall into a deep sleep.

horn-attack.name: Horn Attack
horn-attack.description:
The target is jabbed with a sharply pointed horn to
inflict damage.

relic-song.name: Relic Song
relic-song.description:
The user sings an ancient song and attacks by
appealing to the hearts of the listening opposing
Pokémon. This may also induce sleep.

mist.name: Mist
mist.description:
The user cloaks itself and its allies in a white mist
that prevents any of their stats from being lowered
for five turns.

zen-headbutt.name: Zen Headbutt
zen-headbutt.description:
The user focuses its willpower to its head and
attacks the target. This may also make the
target flinch.

water-gun.name: Water Gun
water-gun.description: The target is blasted with a forceful shot of water.

heal-block.name: Heal Block
heal-block.description:
For five turns, the user prevents the opposing team
from using any moves, Abilities, or held items that
recover HP.

iron-head.name: Iron Head
iron-head.description:
The user slams the target with its steel-hard head.
This may also make the target flinch.

origin-pulse.name: Origin Pulse
origin-pulse.description:
The user attacks opposing Pokémon with countless
beams of light that glow a deep and brilliant blue.

nasty-plot.name: Nasty Plot
nasty-plot.description:
The user stimulates its brain by thinking bad
thoughts. This sharply raises the user’s Sp. Atk stat.

sleep-powder.name: Sleep Powder
sleep-powder.description:
The user scatters a big cloud of sleep-inducing dust
around the target.

crabhammer.name: Crabhammer
crabhammer.description:
The target is hammered with a large pincer. Critical
hits land more easily.

aerial-ace.name: Aerial Ace
aerial-ace.description:
The user confounds the target with speed, then
slashes. This attack never misses.

string-shot.name: String Shot
string-shot.description:
The opposing Pokémon are bound with silk blown
from the user’s mouth that harshly lowers the
Speed stat.

double-edge.name: Double-Edge
double-edge.description:
A reckless, life-risking tackle. This also damages the
user quite a lot.

bulk-up.name: Bulk Up
bulk-up.description:
The user tenses its muscles to bulk up its body,
raising both its Attack and Defense stats.

strange-steam.name: Strange Steam
strange-steam.description: Strange Steam deals damage and has a 20% chance of confusing the target.

play-rough.name: Play Rough
play-rough.description:
The user plays rough with the target and attacks it.
This may also lower the target’s Attack stat.

meteor-mash.name: Meteor Mash
meteor-mash.description:
The target is hit with a hard punch fired like a
meteor. This may also raise the user’s Attack stat.

icicle-spear.name: Icicle Spear
icicle-spear.description:
The user launches sharp icicles at the target two to
five times in a row.

will-o-wisp.name: Will-O-Wisp
will-o-wisp.description:
The user shoots a sinister, bluish-white flame at the
target to inflict a burn.

liquidation.name: Liquidation
liquidation.description:
The user slams into the target using a full-force
blast of water. This may also lower the target’s
Defense stat.

grass-pledge.name: Grass Pledge
grass-pledge.description:
A column of grass hits the target. When used with
its water equivalent, its power increases and a vast
swamp appears.

fire-fang.name: Fire Fang
fire-fang.description:
The user bites with flame-cloaked fangs. This may
also make the target flinch or leave it with a burn.

hammer-arm.name: Hammer Arm
hammer-arm.description:
The user swings and hits with its strong, heavy fist.
It lowers the user’s Speed, however.

revenge.name: Revenge
revenge.description:
This attack move’s power is doubled if the user has
been hurt by the opponent in the same turn.

flatter.name: Flatter
flatter.description:
Flattery is used to confuse the target. However,
this also raises the target’s Sp. Atk stat.

poison-gas.name: Poison Gas
poison-gas.description:
A cloud of poison gas is sprayed in the face of
opposing Pokémon, poisoning those hit.

heal-order.name: Heal Order
heal-order.description:
The user calls out its underlings to heal it. The user
regains up to half of its max HP.

guard-swap.name: Guard Swap
guard-swap.description:
The user employs its psychic power to switch
changes to its Defense and Sp. Def stats with
the target.

ice-punch.name: Ice Punch
ice-punch.description:
The target is punched with an icy fist. This may also
leave the target frozen.

heat-crash.name: Heat Crash
heat-crash.description:
The user slams its target with its flame-covered
body. The more the user outweighs the target, the
greater the move’s power.

chip-away.name: Chip Away
chip-away.description:
Looking for an opening, the user strikes consistently.
The target’s stat changes don’t affect this
attack’s damage.

triple-kick.name: Triple Kick
triple-kick.description:
A consecutive three-kick attack that becomes more
powerful with each successful hit.

body-slam.name: Body Slam
body-slam.description:
The user drops onto the target with its full body
weight. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

fire-pledge.name: Fire Pledge
fire-pledge.description:
A column of fire hits the target. When used with its
grass equivalent, its power increases and a vast sea
of fire appears.

rock-polish.name: Rock Polish
rock-polish.description:
The user polishes its body to reduce drag.
This can sharply raise the Speed stat.

air-slash.name: Air Slash
air-slash.description:
The user attacks with a blade of air that slices even
the sky. This may also make the target flinch.

psystrike.name: Psystrike
psystrike.description:
The user materializes an odd psychic wave to attack
the target. This attack does physical damage.

water-spout.name: Water Spout
water-spout.description:
The user spouts water to damage opposing
Pokémon. The lower the user’s HP, the lower the
move’s power.

high-horsepower.name: High Horsepower
high-horsepower.description:
The user fiercely attacks the target using its
entire body.

sunny-day.name: Sunny Day
sunny-day.description:
The user intensifies the sun for five turns, powering
up Fire-type moves. It lowers the power of
Water-type moves.

final-gambit.name: Final Gambit
final-gambit.description:
The user risks everything to attack its target. The
user faints but does damage equal to its HP.

rock-blast.name: Rock Blast
rock-blast.description:
The user hurls hard rocks at the target. Two to five
rocks are launched in a row.

x-scissor.name: X-Scissor
x-scissor.description:
The user slashes at the target by crossing its
scythes or claws as if they were a pair of scissors.

lava-plume.name: Lava Plume
lava-plume.description:
The user torches everything around it in an inferno
of scarlet flames. This may also leave those it hits
with a burn.

fiery-wrath.name: Fiery Wrath
fiery-wrath.description: Fiery Wrath damages all opponents. It has a 20% chance to cause each target to flinch.

magnet-rise.name: Magnet Rise
magnet-rise.description:
The user levitates using electrically generated
magnetism granting them immunity to ground moves for five turns.

zap-cannon.name: Zap Cannon
zap-cannon.description:
The user fires an electric blast like a cannon to inflict
damage and cause paralysis.

drum-beating.name: Drum Beating
drum-beating.description: Drum Beating inflicts damage and lowers the target's Speed stat by one stage.

brutal-swing.name: Brutal Swing
brutal-swing.description:
The user swings its body around violently to inflict
damage on everything in its vicinity.

night-shade.name: Night Shade
night-shade.description:
The user makes the target see a frightening mirage.
It inflicts damage equal to the user’s level.

slack-off.name: Slack Off
slack-off.description:
The user slacks off, restoring its own HP by up to
half of its max HP.

hurricane.name: Hurricane
hurricane.description:
The user attacks by wrapping its opponent in a
fierce wind that flies up into the sky. This may also
confuse the target.

hone-claws.name: Hone Claws
hone-claws.description:
The user sharpens its claws to boost its Attack stat
and accuracy.

bone-rush.name: Bone Rush
bone-rush.description:
The user strikes the target with a hard bone two to
five times in a row.

frost-breath.name: Frost Breath
frost-breath.description:
The user blows its cold breath on the target. This
attack always results in a critical hit.

low-kick.name: Low Kick
low-kick.description:
A powerful low kick that makes the target fall over.
The heavier the target, the greater the
move’s power.

apple-acid.name: Apple Acid
apple-acid.description: Apple Acid inflicts damage and lowers the target's Special Defense stat by one stage.

volt-tackle.name: Volt Tackle
volt-tackle.description:
The user electrifies itself and charges the target.
This also damages the user quite a lot. This attack
may leave the target with paralysis.

magic-coat.name: Magic Coat
magic-coat.description:
A barrier reflects back to the target moves like
Leech Seed and moves that damage status.

twineedle.name: Twineedle
twineedle.description:
The user damages the target twice in succession
by jabbing it with two spikes. This may also poison
the target.

dragon-claw.name: Dragon Claw
dragon-claw.description: The user slashes the target with huge sharp claws.

tri-attack.name: Tri Attack
tri-attack.description:
The user strikes with a simultaneous three-beam
attack. May also burn, freeze, or paralyze the target.

dream-eater.name: Dream Eater
dream-eater.description:
The user eats the dreams of a sleeping target. It
absorbs half the damage caused to heal its own HP.

electro-ball.name: Electro Ball
electro-ball.description:
The user hurls an electric orb at the target. The
faster the user is than the target, the greater the
move’s power.

cotton-spore.name: Cotton Spore
cotton-spore.description:
The user releases cotton-like spores that cling to
the opposing Pokémon, which harshly lowers their
Speed stat.

sand-attack.name: Sand Attack
sand-attack.description:
Sand is hurled in the target’s face, reducing the
target’s accuracy.

sludge-wave.name: Sludge Wave
sludge-wave.description:
The user strikes everything around it by swamping
the area with a giant sludge wave. This may also
poison those hit.

reflect.name: Reflect
reflect.description:
A wondrous wall of light is put up to reduce damage
from physical attacks for five turns.

shadow-sneak.name: Shadow Sneak
shadow-sneak.description:
The user extends its shadow and attacks the target
from behind. This move always goes first.

force-palm.name: Force Palm
force-palm.description:
The target is attacked with a shock wave. This may
also leave the target with paralysis.

leech-seed.name: Leech Seed
leech-seed.description:
A seed is planted on the target. It steals some HP
from the target every turn.

blizzard.name: Blizzard
blizzard.description:
A howling blizzard is summoned to strike opposing
Pokémon. This may also leave the opposing
Pokémon frozen.

mega-punch.name: Mega Punch
mega-punch.description:
The target is slugged by a punch thrown with
muscle-packed power.

thief.name: Thief
thief.description:
The user attacks and steals the target’s held item
simultaneously. The user can’t steal anything if it
already holds an item.

razor-shell.name: Razor Shell
razor-shell.description:
The user cuts its target with sharp shells. This may
also lower the target’s Defense stat.

mystical-fire.name: Mystical Fire
mystical-fire.description:
The user attacks by breathing a special, hot fire.
This also lowers the target’s Sp. Atk stat.

destiny-bond.name: Destiny Bond
destiny-bond.description:
After using this move, if the user faints, the
Pokémon that landed the knockout hit also faints.
Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

rolling-kick.name: Rolling Kick
rolling-kick.description:
The user lashes out with a quick, spinning kick.
This may also make the target flinch.

struggle-bug.name: Struggle Bug
struggle-bug.description:
While resisting, the user attacks the opposing
Pokémon. This lowers the Sp. Atk stat of those hit.

topsy-turvy.name: Topsy-Turvy
topsy-turvy.description:
All stat changes affecting the target turn
topsy-turvy and become the opposite of what
they were.

strength.name: Strength
strength.description:
The target is slugged with a punch thrown at
maximum power.

avalanche.name: Avalanche
avalanche.description:
The power of this attack move is doubled if the user
has been hurt by the target in the same turn.

grav-apple.name: Grav Apple
grav-apple.description: Grav Apple inflicts damage and lowers the target's Defense stat by one stage.

seed-bomb.name: Seed Bomb
seed-bomb.description:
The user slams a barrage of hard-shelled seeds
down on the target from above.

bonemerang.name: Bonemerang
bonemerang.description:
The user throws the bone it holds. The bone loops
around to hit the target twice—coming and going.

dynamic-punch.name: Dynamic Punch
dynamic-punch.description:
The user punches the target with full, concentrated
power. This confuses the target if it hits.

luster-purge.name: Luster Purge
luster-purge.description:
The user lets loose a damaging burst of light. This
may also lower the target’s Sp. Def stat.

aqua-tail.name: Aqua Tail
aqua-tail.description:
The user attacks by swinging its tail as if it were a
vicious wave in a raging storm.

moonblast.name: Moonblast
moonblast.description:
Borrowing the power of the moon, the user attacks
the target. This may also lower the target’s
Sp. Atk stat.

flash-cannon.name: Flash Cannon
flash-cannon.description:
The user gathers all its light energy and releases it
all at once. This may also lower the target’s
Sp. Def stat.

defend-order.name: Defend Order
defend-order.description:
The user calls out its underlings to shield its body,
raising its Defense and Sp. Def stats.

brave-bird.name: Brave Bird
brave-bird.description:
The user tucks in its wings and charges from a low
altitude. This also damages the user quite a lot.

metal-burst.name: Metal Burst
metal-burst.description:
The user retaliates with much greater force against
the opponent that last inflicted damage on it.

detect.name: Detect
detect.description:
Enables the user to evade all attacks. Its chance of
failing rises if it is used in succession.

moonlight.name: Moonlight
moonlight.description:
The user restores its own HP. The amount of HP
regained varies with the weather.

amnesia.name: Amnesia
amnesia.description:
The user temporarily empties its mind to forget its
concerns. This sharply raises the user’s Sp. Def stat.

overdrive.name: Overdrive
overdrive.description: Overdrive inflicts damage to all opponents.

haze.name: Haze
haze.description:
The user creates a haze that eliminates every stat
change among all the Pokémon engaged in battle.

double-team.name: Double Team
double-team.description:
By moving rapidly, the user makes illusory copies of
itself to raise its evasiveness.

secret-sword.name: Secret Sword
secret-sword.description:
The user cuts with its long horn. The odd power
contained in the horn does physical damage to
the target.

dual-wingbeat.name: Dual Wingbeat
dual-wingbeat.description: Dual Wingbeat inflicts damage, hitting twice per use. Each strike has an equal chance to be a critical hit.

pollen-puff.name: Pollen Puff
pollen-puff.description:
The user attacks the enemy with a pollen puff that
explodes. If the target is an ally, it gives the ally a
pollen puff that restores its HP instead.

rock-smash.name: Rock Smash
rock-smash.description:
The user attacks with a punch. This may also lower
the target’s Defense stat.

gear-grind.name: Gear Grind
gear-grind.description:
The user attacks by throwing steel gears at its
target twice.

fleur-cannon.name: Fleur Cannon
fleur-cannon.description:
The user unleashes a strong beam. The attack’s
recoil harshly lowers the user’s Sp. Atk stat.

cosmic-power.name: Cosmic Power
cosmic-power.description:
The user absorbs a mystical power from space to
raise its Defense and Sp. Def stats.

head-charge.name: Head Charge
head-charge.description:
The user charges its head into its target, using its
powerful guard hair. This also damages the user
a little.

wood-hammer.name: Wood Hammer
wood-hammer.description:
The user slams its rugged body into the target to
attack. This also damages the user quite a lot.

fake-tears.name: Fake Tears
fake-tears.description:
The user feigns crying to fluster the target, harshly
lowering its Sp. Def stat.

metal-sound.name: Metal Sound
metal-sound.description:
A horrible sound like scraping metal harshly lowers
the target’s Sp. Def stat.

glare.name: Glare
glare.description:
The user intimidates the target with the pattern on
its belly to cause paralysis.

false-surrender.name: False Surrender
false-surrender.description: False Surrender inflicts damage and bypasses accuracy checks to always hit, unless the target is in the semi-invulnerable turn of a move such as Dig or Fly.

feather-dance.name: Feather Dance
feather-dance.description:
The user covers the target’s body with a mass of
down that harshly lowers its Attack stat.

dragon-hammer.name: Dragon Hammer
dragon-hammer.description:
The user uses its body like a hammer to attack the
target and inflict damage.

power-trip.name: Power Trip
power-trip.description:
The user boasts its strength and attacks the target.
The more the user’s stats are raised, the greater the
move’s power.

stun-spore.name: Stun Spore
stun-spore.description:
The user scatters a cloud of numbing powder that
paralyzes the target.

confuse-ray.name: Confuse Ray
confuse-ray.description:
The target is exposed to a sinister ray that
triggers confusion.

storm-throw.name: Storm Throw
storm-throw.description:
The user strikes the target with a fierce blow. This
attack always results in a critical hit.

acrobatics.name: Acrobatics
acrobatics.description: The user nimbly strikes the target.

sparkling-aria.name: Sparkling Aria
sparkling-aria.description:
The user bursts into song, emitting many bubbles.
Any Pokémon suffering from a burn will be healed
by the touch of these bubbles.

nuzzle.name: Nuzzle
nuzzle.description:
The user attacks by nuzzling its electrified cheeks
against the target. This also leaves the target
with paralysis.

icicle-crash.name: Icicle Crash
icicle-crash.description:
The user attacks by harshly dropping large icicles
onto the target. This may also make the target flinch.

charm.name: Charm
charm.description:
The user gazes at the target rather charmingly,
making it less wary. This harshly lowers its
Attack stat.

swords-dance.name: Swords Dance
swords-dance.description:
A frenetic dance to uplift the fighting spirit.
This sharply raises the user’s Attack stat.

charge-beam.name: Charge Beam
charge-beam.description:
The user attacks with an electric charge. The user
may use any remaining electricity to raise its
Sp. Atk stat.

freezing-glare.name: Freezing Glare
freezing-glare.description: Freezing Glare inflicts damage and has a 10% chance to freeze the target.

leaf-blade.name: Leaf Blade
leaf-blade.description:
The user handles a sharp leaf like a sword and
attacks by cutting its target. Critical hits land
more easily.

zing-zap.name: Zing Zap
zing-zap.description:
A strong electric blast crashes down on the target,
giving it an electric shock. This may also make the
target flinch.

discharge.name: Discharge
discharge.description:
The user strikes everything around it by letting loose
a flare of electricity. This may also cause paralysis.

draco-meteor.name: Draco Meteor
draco-meteor.description:
Comets are summoned down from the sky onto the
target. The attack’s recoil harshly lowers the user’s
Sp. Atk stat.

judgment.name: Judgment
judgment.description:
The user releases countless shots of light at the
target. This move’s type varies depending on the
kind of Plate the user is holding.

flamethrower.name: Flamethrower
flamethrower.description:
The target is scorched with an intense blast of fire.
This may also leave the target with a burn.

calm-mind.name: Calm Mind
calm-mind.description:
The user quietly focuses its mind and calms its
spirit to raise its Sp. Atk and Sp. Def stats.

parabolic-charge.name: Parabolic Charge
parabolic-charge.description:
The user attacks everything around it. The user’s HP
is restored by half the damage taken by those hit.

moongeist-beam.name: Moongeist Beam
moongeist-beam.description:
The user emits a sinister ray to attack the target.
This move can be used on the target regardless of 
its Abilities.

waterfall.name: Waterfall
waterfall.description:
The user charges at the target and may make
it flinch.

wild-charge.name: Wild Charge
wild-charge.description:
The user shrouds itself in electricity and smashes
into its target. This also damages the user a little.

thunder-cage.name: Thunder Cage
thunder-cage.description: In addition to dealing damage, Thunder Cage inflicts 1/8 of the target's maximum HP as damage per turn for four to five turns upon use. It also traps the target, preventing switching and escape.

blaze-kick.name: Blaze Kick
blaze-kick.description:
The user launches a kick that lands a critical hit
more easily. This may also leave the target with
a burn.

trop-kick.name: Trop Kick
trop-kick.description:
The user lands an intense kick of tropical origins on
the target. This also lowers the target’s Attack stat.

sucker-punch.name: Sucker Punch
sucker-punch.description:
This move enables the user to attack first. This move
fails if the target is not readying an attack.

drain-punch.name: Drain Punch
drain-punch.description:
An energy-draining punch. The user’s HP is restored
by half the damage taken by the target.

thunderbolt.name: Thunderbolt
thunderbolt.description:
A strong electric blast crashes down on the target.
This may also leave the target with paralysis.

extreme-speed.name: Extreme Speed
extreme-speed.description:
The user charges the target at blinding speed.
This move always goes first.

dragon-darts.name: Dragon Darts
dragon-darts.description: Dragon Darts is a multi-strike move that deals damage twice.

mist-ball.name: Mist Ball
mist-ball.description:
A mist-like flurry of down envelops and damages the
target. This may also lower the target’s Sp. Atk stat.

superpower.name: Superpower
superpower.description:
The user attacks the target with great power.
However, this also lowers the user’s Attack and
Defense stats.

lunge.name: Lunge
lunge.description:
The user makes a lunge at the target, attacking with
full force. This also lowers the target’s Attack stat.

bullet-seed.name: Bullet Seed
bullet-seed.description:
The user forcefully shoots seeds at the target two
to five times in a row.

focus-blast.name: Focus Blast
focus-blast.description:
The user heightens its mental focus and unleashes
its power. This may also lower the target’s 
Sp. Def stat.

psycho-boost.name: Psycho Boost
psycho-boost.description:
The user attacks the target at full power. The
attack’s recoil harshly lowers the user’s
Sp. Atk stat.

thunder.name: Thunder
thunder.description:
A wicked thunderbolt is dropped on the target to
inflict damage. This may also leave the target
with paralysis.

karate-chop.name: Karate Chop
karate-chop.description:
The target is attacked with a sharp chop. Critical
hits land more easily.

steam-eruption.name: Steam Eruption
steam-eruption.description:
The user immerses the target in superheated steam.
This may also leave the target with a burn.

shift-gear.name: Shift Gear
shift-gear.description:
The user rotates its gears, raising its Attack stat and
sharply raising its Speed stat.

psyshock.name: Psyshock
psyshock.description:
The user materializes an odd psychic wave to attack
the target. This attack does physical damage.

overheat.name: Overheat
overheat.description:
The user attacks the target at full power. The
attack’s recoil harshly lowers the user’s Sp. Atk stat.

fire-blast.name: Fire Blast
fire-blast.description:
The target is attacked with an intense blast of
all-consuming fire. This may also leave the target
with a burn.

heat-wave.name: Heat Wave
heat-wave.description:
The user attacks by exhaling hot breath on the
opposing Pokémon. This may also leave those
Pokémon with a burn.

leech-life.name: Leech Life
leech-life.description:
The user drains the target’s blood. The user’s HP is
restored by half the damage taken by the target.

behemoth-bash.name: Behemoth Bash
behemoth-bash.description: Behemoth Bash deals damage. If the target is Dynamaxed or Gigantamaxed, its base power is doubled to 200.

precipice-blades.name: Precipice Blades
precipice-blades.description:
The user attacks opposing Pokémon by manifesting
the power of the land in fearsome blades of stone.

fire-lash.name: Fire Lash
fire-lash.description:
The user strikes the target with a burning lash. This
also lowers the target’s Defense stat.

whirlpool.name: Whirlpool
whirlpool.description:
The user traps the target in a violent swirling
whirlpool for four to five turns.

fire-spin.name: Fire Spin
fire-spin.description:
The target becomes trapped within a fierce vortex
of fire that rages for four to five turns.

freeze-dry.name: Freeze-Dry
freeze-dry.description:
The user rapidly cools the target. This may also
leave the target frozen. This move is super effective
on Water types.

fiery-dance.name: Fiery Dance
fiery-dance.description:
Cloaked in flames, the user dances and flaps its
wings. This may also raise the user’s Sp. Atk stat.

sunsteel-strike.name: Sunsteel Strike
sunsteel-strike.description:
The user slams into the target with the force of a
meteor. This move can be used on the target 
regardless of its Abilities.

ember.name: Ember
ember.description:
The target is attacked with small flames. This may
also leave the target with a burn.

snap-trap.name: Snap Trap
snap-trap.description: In addition to dealing damage, Snap Trap inflicts 1/8 of the target's maximum HP as damage per turn for four to five turns upon use. It also traps the target, preventing switching and escape.

fissure.name: Fissure
fissure.description:
The user opens up a fissure in the ground and drops
the target in. The target faints instantly if this
attack hits.

power-up-punch.name: Power-Up Punch
power-up-punch.description:
Striking opponents over and over makes the user’s
fists harder. Hitting a target raises the Attack stat.

roar.name: Roar
roar.description:
The target is scared off, and a different Pokémon is
dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against a
single Pokémon.

flare-blitz.name: Flare Blitz
flare-blitz.description:
The user cloaks itself in fire and charges the target.
This also damages the user quite a lot. This attack
may leave the target with a burn.

leaf-storm.name: Leaf Storm
leaf-storm.description:
The user whips up a storm of leaves around the
target. The attack’s recoil harshly lowers the user’s
Sp. Atk stat.

thunderous-kick.name: Thunderous Kick
thunderous-kick.description: Thunderous Kick inflicts damage and lowers the target's Defense stat.

sand-tomb.name: Sand Tomb
sand-tomb.description:
The user traps the target inside a harshly raging
sandstorm for four to five turns.

whirlwind.name: Whirlwind
whirlwind.description:
The target is blown away, and a different Pokémon is
dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against a
single Pokémon.

behemoth-blade.name: Behemoth Blade
behemoth-blade.description: Behemoth Blade deals damage. If the target is Dynamaxed or Gigantamaxed, its base power is doubled to 200.

bind.name: Bind
bind.description:
Things such as long bodies or tentacles are used to
bind and squeeze the target for four to five turns.

barrage.name: Barrage
barrage.description:
Round objects are hurled at the target to strike two
to five times in a row.

sheer-cold.name: Sheer Cold
sheer-cold.description:
The target faints instantly. It’s less likely to hit the
target if it’s used by Pokémon other than Ice types. Ice types are immune.

baton-pass.name: Baton Pass
baton-pass.description:
The user switches places with a party Pokémon in
waiting and passes along any stat changes.

head-smash.name: Head Smash
head-smash.description:
The user attacks the target with a hazardous,
full-power headbutt. This also damages the
user terribly.

volt-switch.name: Volt Switch
volt-switch.description:
After making its attack, the user rushes back to
switch places with a party Pokémon in waiting.

close-combat.name: Close Combat
close-combat.description:
The user fights the target up close without guarding
itself. This also lowers the user’s Defense and
Sp. Def stats.

spacial-rend.name: Spacial Rend
spacial-rend.description:
The user tears the target along with the space
around it. Critical hits land more easily.

wrap.name: Wrap
wrap.description:
A long body, vines, or the like are used to wrap and 
squeeze the target for four to five turns.

eruption.name: Eruption
eruption.description:
The user attacks opposing Pokémon with explosive
fury. The lower the user’s HP, the lower the
move’s power.

dragon-tail.name: Dragon Tail
dragon-tail.description:
The target is knocked away, and a different Pokémon
is dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against
a single Pokémon.

searing-shot.name: Searing Shot
searing-shot.description:
The user torches everything around it in an inferno
of scarlet flames. This may also leave those it hits
with a burn.

pay-day.name: Pay Day
pay-day.description:
Numerous coins are hurled at the target to inflict
damage.

inferno.name: Inferno
inferno.description:
The user attacks by engulfing the target in an
intense fire. This leaves the target with a burn.

clamp.name: Clamp
clamp.description:
The target is clamped and squeezed by the user’s
very thick and sturdy shell for four to five turns.

pound.name: Pound
pound.description:
The target is physically pounded with a long tail, a
foreleg, or the like.

parting-shot.name: Parting Shot
parting-shot.description:
With a parting threat, the user lowers the target’s
Attack and Sp. Atk stats. Then it switches with a
party Pokémon.

techno-blast.name: Techno Blast
techno-blast.description:
The user fires a beam of light at its target. The
move’s type changes depending on the Drive the
user holds.

kinesis.name: Kinesis
kinesis.description:
The user distracts the target by bending a spoon.
This lowers the target’s accuracy.

double-slap.name: Double Slap
double-slap.description:
The target is slapped repeatedly, back and forth,
two to five times in a row.

venom-drench.name: Venom Drench
venom-drench.description:
Opposing Pokémon are drenched in an odd
poisonous liquid. This lowers the Attack, Sp. Atk, and
Speed stats of a poisoned target.

scratch.name: Scratch
scratch.description:
Hard, pointed, sharp claws rake the target to
inflict damage.

circle-throw.name: Circle Throw
circle-throw.description:
The target is thrown, and a different Pokémon is
dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against
a single Pokémon.

meditate.name: Meditate
meditate.description:
The user meditates to awaken the power deep
within its body and raise its Attack stat.

lovely-kiss.name: Lovely Kiss
lovely-kiss.description:
With a scary face, the user tries to force a kiss on
the target. If it succeeds, the target falls asleep.

fairy-wind.name: Fairy Wind
fairy-wind.description:
The user stirs up a fairy wind and strikes the target
with it.

snore.name: Snore
snore.description:
This attack can be used only if the user is asleep.
The harsh noise may also make the target flinch.

infestation.name: Infestation
infestation.description:
The target is infested and attacked for four to five
turns. The target can’t flee during this time.

acid.name: Acid
acid.description:
The opposing Pokémon are attacked with a spray of
harsh acid. This may also lower their Sp. Def stat.

pursuit.name: Pursuit
pursuit.description:
The power of this attack move is doubled if it’s used
on a target that’s switching out of battle.

fusion-bolt.name: Fusion Bolt
fusion-bolt.description:
The user throws down a giant lightning bolt. This
move’s power is increased when influenced by an
enormous flame.

multi-attack.name: Multi-Attack
multi-attack.description:
Cloaking itself in high energy, the user slams into the
target. The memory held determines the move’s type.

teleport.name: Teleport
teleport.description: Use it to flee from any wild Pokémon.

belly-drum.name: Belly Drum
belly-drum.description:
The user maximizes its Attack stat in exchange for
HP equal to half its max HP.

boomburst.name: Boomburst
boomburst.description:
The user attacks everything around it with the
destructive power of a terrible, explosive sound.

recover.name: Recover
recover.description:
Restoring its own cells, the user restores its own HP
by half of its max HP.

powder-snow.name: Powder Snow
powder-snow.description:
The user attacks with a chilling gust of powdery
snow. This may also freeze the opposing Pokémon.

cotton-guard.name: Cotton Guard
cotton-guard.description:
The user protects itself by wrapping its body in soft
cotton, which drastically raises the user’s
Defense stat.
